proposed EDD - LG ( shared ) method.from sentence: Among the ablations , the proposed EDD - LG ( shared ) method works way better than the other variants in terms of BLEU and METEOR metrics by achieving an improvement of 8 % and 6 % in the scores respectively over the baseline method for 50 K dataset and an improvement of 10 % and 7 % in the scores respectively for 100 K dataset .
